mentionedBy.name: UiPath Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Straightforward, low-code RPA tool that doesn't require heavy IT involvement. Designed to automate repetitive tasks and UI interactions across web and desktop applications without needing advanced technical skills, making it ideal for SMBs.
